patthana8.72:1.1: Naniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana8.72:2.1: Naaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.72:3.1: Naniyatañca naaniyatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana8.72:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
